link_desc:
Yet another PostgreSQL template, this one is derived from Andre Roche's template, continuing to use a userparameter.conf file, and is meant to take advantage of features in Zabbix 3.4+ ( dependent items ), as well as new features in PostgreSQL as they become available.

As I add features, I will document them in the README file in the git repo.

Oct 9th, 2018: New Monitor / Alerts for Max Freeze Age
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent Active|Database Monitor|Dependent Items
author: 2ndQuadrant
